#include <bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long ll;
#define MOD     1000000007
#define pb      push_back
#define mp      make_pair
#define ff      first
#define sc      second
#define MAXN    1005
#define INPFILE freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define OUTPFILE freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0);
    int t,n,kl;
    char str[20005];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&kl);
        scanf("%s",str);
        int l=strlen(str);
        int k,f[20005];
        memset(f,0,sizeof f);
        f[0]=1;
        k=0;
        for(int i=1;i<l;i++)
        {
            if(str[i]==str[i-1])
                f[k]++;
            else
                f[++k]++;

        }
        int index=0,p=0;
        for(int i=0;i<=k;i++)
        {
            if(f[i]>=kl)
                {p=1;index=i;break;}
        }
        if(p!=1)
          cout<<"-1"<<'\n';
        else
        {
            float ans=0;
            for(int i=0;i<=k;i++)
            {
                ans+=ceil(f[i]*1.0/kl);
            }


            cout<<ans<<'\n';

        }

    }



    return 0;
}
